thread.title: Italy’s election drags racism into the spotlight

title: Italy’s election drags racism into the spotlight
text:
Italy’s election drags racism into the spotlight Thursday, March 01, 2018 - 02:36 
A racially motivated attack and a growing backlash against migrants have put race at the heart of Italy’s election campaign. Many fear not only hard-right, but also small fascist groups, are on the rise.   
A racially motivated attack and a growing backlash against migrants have put race at the heart of Italy’s election campaign. Many fear not only hard-right, but also small fascist groups, are on the rise.  //reut.rs/2HQNFcJ
